message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I believe it would be a great fit for you. I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $9,000?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but this product is truly valuable. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $10,500?
